name: Shoot Me Some Bugs
description:
A fast paced top down shooter, with 2 different enemy types. You have to survive for 12 waves of enemy onslaught in order to win the game.  You can take help from the occasional health pickup and powerups to aid you in your mission. Ensure unmuted run for the full experience.

This is my first game, and made completely using free Assets sourced from Unity Asset Store as well as OpenGameArt.

https://opengameart.org/

Special Thanks to Cethiel for making available pickup sprites to public domain for free. Check out his Patreon below

https://www.patreon.com/cethiel
